A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I am incredibly disappointed in this movie.
I think it's a complete disaster with writer Rian Johnson\, it's like he have never seen or read anything related to Star Wars.
Like Mark Hamill said\, they only focus on making money\, and they don't care about any of the characters or making a good movie.
Well\, they do care about developing the new characters Rey\, Kylo\, Finn\, etc... but with great disregard for the original characters.

The movie is really well made in a sense of scenery\, it's visually really well made but the content as I specified earlier... is incredibly bad\, I am at loss for words\, can't believe they ruined the Star Wars universe.
